comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to NYT [ April 10, 1910 -- query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9F02E3D81539E433A... ] Marjorie Curtis was the daughter of Dr.and Mrs. H. Holbrook Curtis. She figured frequently in the NYT society columns -- coming out in 1907 [ query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9D06E1DE173EE233A... describes her as in "the Southampton set.". She became Mrs. Thomas L. Chadbourne NYT query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9A07E0DF153CE533A... SOCIAL NOTES; New York. January 10, 1921, Monday The wedding of Miss Marjorie A. Curtis, daughter of Mrs. H. Holbrook Curtis, and Thomas L. Chadbourne will take place on Saturday, Jan. 15, at the home of the bride's mother, 500 Madison Avenue, with none but relatives present.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: A New York Times story, June 18, 1913, reported the roster of winners at Belmont Park on race day: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?_r=1&res=9406E...
